comments.author: Hosein334
comments.body: You are the seller and I am the buyer. I can buy from you whenever I want, and because I didn't want to buy, I became a thief? I didn't know that buying was mandatory.Friends, be careful of dealing with this person, he has registered for 30 days, don't be fooled
